alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 7:47AM CDT until May 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Jacks Fork at Alley Spring. * WHEN...From this afternoon to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, water impacts Alley Spring Campground. Water is one foot in depth at the 600, 800 and 900 loop camp sites. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
